00019 void TetraMotionState::setWorldTransform(const btTransform &worldTrans) 
00020 {
00021         if(NULL == mVisibleobj) return; // silently return before we set a node
00022         btQuaternion rot = worldTrans.getRotation();
00023         mVisibleobj->setOrientation(rot.w(), rot.x(), rot.y(), rot.z());
00024         btVector3 pos = worldTrans.getOrigin();
00025         mVisibleobj->setPosition(pos.x(), pos.y()-2, pos.z());
00026 }
